short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download subtitles and captions from YouTube with a single click. All subtitle languages are supported.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download subtitles from YouTube with this extension very easily.
This extension places a small button below YouTube videos. This button takes you to the list of subtitles of the corresponding video when clicked!
You can get .srt .vtt and .txt versions of the transcriptions.

The button is placed right below the video player. Check the screenshots to see how it looks.
With this Youtube subtitle downloader extension, you will be able to transcribe both native spoken captions and auto-translated subtitles of the video.

Top Features:
✔️ It's totally free.
✔️ Unlimited subtitle downloads.
✔️ Most popular subtitle formats (srt vtt and txt)
✔️ All subtitle languages are supported.
✔️ Fast and secure downloads.
